channel.title: How Do I make Edge a 1v1 pking place so no one can team?

item.title: How Do I make Edge a 1v1 pking place so no one can team?
item.dc:creator: @monger monger
item.description:
@monger wrote:

NO! do not add what they are saying to add. This will make you able to attack somebody but they can’t attack you back. Please don’t post unless you know what you’re posting about…

What you need to do is make a string(a variable almost but it’s text) and then make that string equal to the player name upon attacking. Then, add a boolean that will flip from true to false when in combat.

Now, you would put something like:

if(attackingOn.yourIncombatBoolean == true && yourString != attackingOn.playerName){
sendMessage("That player is already in combat!");
ResetAttack();
}

That’s a really basic example, but used like that you can easily code FULL multi/non multi. I would know, I have it in my server.

I would post my code, but it’s much too messy from all of the screw ups I made while trying to code it. I will attempt to do it later, but meh… We’ll see how my responses to my other tutorials are first.

Read full topic

within
